class.name: AudioStreamSynchronized
class.brief_description: Stream that can be fitted with sub-streams, which will be played in-sync.
class.description: This is a stream that can be fitted with sub-streams, which will be played in-sync. The streams being at exactly the same time when play is pressed, and will end when the last of them ends. If one of the sub-streams loops, then playback will continue.

method.name: get_sync_stream
method.description: Get one of the synchronized streams, by index.

method.name: get_sync_stream_volume
method.description: Get the volume of one of the synchronized streams, by index.

method.name: set_sync_stream
method.description: Set one of the synchronized streams, by index.

method.name: set_sync_stream_volume
method.description: Set the volume of one of the synchronized streams, by index.

members.member: Set the total amount of streams that will be played back synchronized.

constants.constant: Maximum amount of streams that can be synchrohized.
